report.title: Explore taxonomy breakdown with standard filters for CEDaR
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in CEDaR, with standardised filtering parameters. Breakdown of species counts down to the family level. The current difference between this and filterable_explore_list_taxonomy_breakdown is this report can be filtered by taxon_list_id.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id AND (ttl.taxon_list_id=#taxon_list_id# OR #taxon_list_id#=0) JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND ttl.kingdom_taxon IS NOT NULL #idlist#

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: Taxon list to limit report to
